message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a small portion, but I think I deserve more.
That's a bit too generous to you, Bob. I'm not giving up that much yet.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Meet me in the middle?
I'm getting closer to what I want. You can still get a decent share if you accept.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not giving up that much.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up control. Meet me in the middle again?
I'm not budging much more. You can either take it or leave it.
You're being unreasonable, Bob. I'm not accepting such a lopsided deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm getting closer to what I want. You can still get a tiny share if you accept.
This is ridiculous, Bob. I'm not accepting such an insultingly small share.
I'm not going to give up, Bob. I'll meet you at the 38-62 mark, but that's as low as I'll go.
